qas.question: Which music video game featured a plethora of Queen songs?
Who collaborated with Freddie Mercury on the song Under Pressure?
Which member of Queen discussed a possible Queen Rock Band video game?
What Heavy Metal band had a video game in which Queen was featured?

context: Queen have been featured multiple times in the <a0_0>Guitar Hero<a0_0/> franchise: a cover of "Killer Queen" in the original Guitar Hero, "We Are The Champions", "Fat Bottomed Girls", and the Paul Rodgers collaboration "C-lebrity" in a track pack for Guitar Hero World Tour, "Under Pressure" with <a1_0>David Bowie<a1_0/> in Guitar Hero 5, "I Want It All" in Guitar Hero: Van Halen, "Stone Cold Crazy" in Guitar Hero: <a3_0>Metallica<a3_0/>, and "Bohemian Rhapsody" in Guitar Hero: Warriors of Rock. On 13 October 2009, <a2_0>Brian May<a2_0/> revealed there was "talk" going on "behind the scenes" about a dedicated Queen Rock Band game.
